author: lgray
body:
Reorganize HcalNoiseSummary into a compressible format expect decreases in compressed file size.
Block together bools, ints, floats, doubles.

No physics change expected/observed.
Please let me know if I need to add iorules (if we want to backport this to 74X).

It would be useful to inform future contributors to this class that they should first do their testing in human readable blocks and then put the necessary variables in the appropriate block of datatypes.
title: Reorganize HcalNoiseSummary in hopes it might be space efficient
